column5: Well I have been fishing the river every night trying to get some hybrid stipers. I finally was able to get into a few. I hooked 4 and landed 2. These things fight so hard. I was using a Zara Spook and they totally demolish the bait. Its a fun way to fish for them! I lost a really big one right at shore that was pushing 10lbs. I went to drag it on to shore and the hooks popped out. Oh well, i let them go any ways.
Oh man i would kill to be on the water with you awesome

Great report and pics Matt!!!  ... but I believe those 2 in the pics are actually White Bass, the Wipers lines are a lot more broken up and darker than on those fish.... but I could be wrong.  There are 2 different crosses for the Wiper, one uses White Bass milt and Striped Bass eggs (that's the Wiper we have here) and the other uses Striped Bass milt and White Bass eggs which is also known as the Sunshine Bass and may be what those fish are.
In that first pic, you remind me of Smilin' Bob from the commercials.  Have you been taking those male enhancement pills?
They're a nice looking fish, I'll bet they did fight hard, WTG...
Great report and pics Matt Sweet reward for your persistence!!!  Congratulations on those beauties Thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice fish.... but when I first read the title, my bleary eyes read "Hybrid Strippers down south...""    I had to look.
Thanks for taking the time to post.  I love the reports that venture from the norm.  Keep em coming!
Oh yeah!.....nice fish, reminds me of sea bass fishing back in England...thanks for posting.
